com.rest.restservice

Class RestParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rest.restservice.RestParams

  • public class RestParams
extends java.lang.Object
    Class generated by custom getParams method with REST service specification.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RestParams.CONTENT
      Type of response content.
      static class  RestParams.RestParam
      Query parameter specification
      PARAMTYPE : INT, BOOLEAN or STRING obligatory: query parameter is mandatory defa : if not mandatory and does not exist use this defa value

    • Constructor Detail

      • RestParams

        public RestParams(java.lang.String requestMethod,
                  java.util.Optional<RestParams.CONTENT> responseContent,
                  boolean crossedAllowed,
                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> methodsAllowed)
        General REST service specification
        Parameters:
        requestMethod - Request method, PUT, GET, DELETE etc
        responseContent - Optional, type of response content, JSON or TEXT
        crossedAllowed - CORS allowed
        methodsAllowed - List of methods allowed, included in the response Header

    • Method Detail

      • getMethodsAllowed

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getMethodsAllowed()
        List of allowed method included in the HTTP response. Used to create "Access-Control-Allow-Methods" header key. "OPTIONS" is added automatically.
        Returns:
        List of responses

      • isCrossedAllowed

        public boolean isCrossedAllowed()
        CORS calls allowed. If true, serveral HTTP header request setting are enabled to allow CORS calls.
        Returns:
        true, CORS is allowed

      • getParams

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,RestParams.RestParam> getParams()
        Get map of expected query URL parameters
        Returns:
        Map of expected parameters

      • getRequestMethod

        public java.lang.String getRequestMethod()
        HTTP method for this REST service
        Returns:
        HTTP method

      • getResponseContent

        public java.util.Optional<RestParams.CONTENT> getResponseContent()
        Get type of respond content TEXT or JSON. if empty Content-Type is not set
        Returns:
        type of content

      • addParam

        public void addParam(java.lang.String paramName,
                     PARAMTYPE ptype)
        Add parameter obligatory specification
        Parameters:
        paramName - Query parameter name
        ptype - Query parameter type

      • addParam

        public void addParam(java.lang.String paramName,
                     PARAMTYPE ptype,
                     ParamValue defa)
        Add specification of optional parameter
        Parameters:
        paramName - Query parameter name
        ptype - Parameter type
        defa - Default value if parameter not found in the URL
